ygData.subject: R: [EQ_Necromancer] Level 4 and 8 spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm the weakest one since when they cast it on you it doesnt take out much hp At level 8 I would get the spells in this order : Bone walk , mend bones , gather
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm the weakest one since when they cast it on you it doesnt take out much
hp
At level 8 I would get the spells in this order :
Bone walk , mend bones , gather shadows , dark empathy , lesser shielding .
Someone told me Dark pact is good too but I havent checked it yet

-----Messaggio originale-----
Da: Andy <skimaster@...>
A: 'EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com' <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Data: marted∩┐╜ 11 maggio 1999 1.57
Oggetto: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Level 4 and 8 spells


>what level poison does poison bolt usee? I mean weak, feeble, poison,
strong, etc.

>> From: Andy <skimaster@...>
>>
>> Right now, I am a level 5 Necromancer. I have bought Cavorting Bones(I
>think that is the name of the level 4 pet spell), Clinging Darkness, and
>Lifespike. Are tehre any other spells I should buy at this level. I am not
>going to buy Gate until level 8, because I will not be travelling far until
>level 8(when I get Gather Shadows). At level 8, what spells should I buy?
>Right now, I am thinking Gather Shadows -> Pet -> Gate -> Ward Undead. Are
>there any other spells I should buy at this level? And should I change this
>order?
>>
>>
>>
>> Leanne, level 5 Gnomish Necromancer
